Content: A man was injured from a shooting that took place in a house. A man was wounded in the Maligakanda area in Maradana after being shot and was hospitalized. The police media spokesmanâ€™s office said that a man had come to the house of a resident of Maradana and had fired into the ground as a result of a heated argument. A 77-year-old resident of Wellampitiya area has been admitted to the Colombo National Hospital with minor injuries. The suspect has fled the area and an investigation is underway to arrest him.
